Using With Changelog Plugin

= Scm Url =
{{{
  <scm>
    <connection>scm:javasvn:http://xxxxx</connection>
    <developerConnection>scm:javasvn:http://xxxxx</developerConnection>
  </scm>
}}}
= Plugin Configuration =
{{{
      <plugin>
        <artifactId>maven-changelog-plugin</artifactId>
        <dependencies>
          <dependency>
            <groupId>com.google.scm.svnjava</groupId>
            <artifactId>maven-scm-provider-svnjava</artifactId>
            <version>1.9</version>
          </dependency>
        </dependencies>
      </plugin>
}}}
